website_summaries.verdict: Great for immune support on its own or as a complement to your current vitamin regimen.
pros: Stands out for containing a mushroom blend designed to boost your immune system by promoting cellular health in your brain and body
Also includes astragalus root, another immune booster
Ingredients are vegan, and quality is guaranteed by GMP
cons: Doesn't include immune boosting vitamins A, B6, C, D or Zinc so is best used as a complementary immune booster

customer_reviews.title: NOW Foods EcoGreen Multi Vitamins were discolored and of poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my NOW Foods EcoGreen Multi Vitamins, and as soon as I opened up my new vitamins I noticed the capsules were discolored and they looked like they were potentially exposed to extreme heat or moisture during the delivery or manufacturing process. I will return this item and try a different brand going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 30+ purchases of NOW supplements. Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff from a great manufacturer. I started buying NOW whenever they have what I want. High quality and competitive prices. I've bought 30+ bottles of various supplements from this brand and have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kammerdiener

customer_reviews.title: ... of my vit-min supplements are Now Foods and especially like this multi over its "men's" multi
customer_reviews.text: Most of my vit-min supplements are Now Foods and especially like this multi over its "men's" multi; not only because it is "green" but much easier to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: R. Heiss

customer_reviews.title: Valued part of my supplement regimen for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Valued part of my supplement regimen for traveling. When at home I eat tons of fruits and veggies so I'm good on that front, but when I travel I become very lazy and need some help. That's where these come in. I can still get my greens while on the go! Pros: No taste Easy to swallow pills Good price for quantity Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: DBratic

customer_reviews.title: 2 capsules were white the rest were brown
customer_reviews.text: This was my second order. I am happy with this product but when I opened the bottle I found 2 white pills. I threw them away because I didn’t know if they’re for something else. Wish I could actually contact the company to let them know. It’s scary to think another supplement is in with what I need 😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Buyer - Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day, and I think they provide excellent vitamin coverage both in combinations and volume of the individual vitamins. I use this as my PRIMARY Supplement!
customer_reviews.author: L. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Best multivitamin value
customer_reviews.text: Great multivitamin value...even the small details like Vit C derived from Calcium ascorbate
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. How good is the product
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. How good is the product? I can't rightly say. It hasn't given me super powers. Yet, it doesn't care obtain half the crap other multivitamins contain, such as dyes. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MindPrints

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic vivitims!
customer_reviews.text: My Mother has taken these for years, and at 84 yrs. Of age she runs circles around me!!
customer_reviews.author: Whispering Eagle Landers

customer_reviews.title: Love em!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best vitamins ever! I love them! So much energy, helps immensely with my seasonal issues. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Penni St. Hilaire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product works great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product this is something we buy again n again
customer_reviews.author: Debbie szczucki

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love these.
customer_reviews.text: I always go back to this vitamin. I notice a big difference in my energy levels if I don't take them. My husband and I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Great for years
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for many years. They are always the same high quality. I can't compare my health without them to my health with them, but I am 75 and I have no illnesses, take no medications, feel great and enjoy my life.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Moritz

customer_reviews.title: I always use now brand it is good quality and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I take these everyday and they have everything in them one could want in a multi vitamin. Don't let people tell you they are too cheap to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Just average
customer_reviews.text: These capsules are OK, but leave a bad after taste
customer_reviews.author: Quad Net

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We take these almost daily and they seem to work well as a multi.
customer_reviews.author: peace warrior

customer_reviews.title: All we ever need
customer_reviews.text: We like the capsules more than the tablets that were hard to swallow. This is the perfect food supplement!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have taken this for a long time and could ...
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this for a long time and could not purchase them at my Fresh and Natural store, so decided to try to order them, Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Andreason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best multivitamin on the market in my opinion. Read the reviews and labels on the others. I am highly impressed with the quality and service.
customer_reviews.author: T. Morris

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I look at the ingredients and I feel this is a wonderful vitamin product
customer_reviews.author: Patsy V. Seay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife says these are good and who am I to argue!
customer_reviews.author: RMS in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: I feel Great
customer_reviews.text: I can tell the difference in my energy level when when I take it. Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Tessy Mulay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Multi-vitamins on the market. NOW is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Sayer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our teenage son and it works great. I bought it because of the vegan capsules and no iron.
customer_reviews.author: lamom58

customer_reviews.title: The Best Multi
customer_reviews.text: This is the best multivitamin I have ever taken, and I having taken them ALL over the years. It actually helped with my energy level after about a week, and also helps my wife's. The recommended dosage is two a day, which my wife takes, but one a day (no pun intended) seems to work the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice vitamins but beware mold!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these vitamins for several years on and off, but the last few batches have had several capsules with mold growing inside. First negative experience with the NOW brand, but I'll be looking for an alternate multivitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy to have found these! You never quite know what you are getting when you purchase vitamins and herbal supplements, but the NOW brand has a good reputation for quality ingredients and manufacturing. These are great vitamins, at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Emmalou

customer_reviews.title: I think the best
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this multi green for about 3-4 months now and I think it has helped me alot with my chronic fatigue and energy level. I would reccomend it to anyone with a chronic illness that also has trouble with being able to eat enough vegetables and fruits to maintain a healthy diet.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Work well - Been using for a couple of years
customer_reviews.text: I use only one per day. I find if I take two I get a headache. One works well for me. I try to eat a healthy diet too and not just focus on supplements. Not always easy in this fast paced / fast food world.
customer_reviews.author: Stinky Special

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and almost zero side effect. Most Mult V cause me some side effect but this one is different.
customer_reviews.author: M.H

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful daily multi vitamin. Gives me lots of energy to get through the day.
customer_reviews.author: c. holasek

customer_reviews.title: This is a great iron free multi vitamin
customer_reviews.text: This is a great iron free multi vitamin. It has all of the essential vitamins in it and also digestive enzymes.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Webb

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good comprehensive formula but I'll look for one that includes lutein next time.
customer_reviews.author: seeking calm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and on time. We have been using these for many years and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Neil610

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I won't use any vitamin or mineral supplements unless it's made by now foods...absolutely love their products!! I can really feel a difference with this vitamin and the fact that there's no iron in it is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: mama waffles

customer_reviews.title: Good Multiple!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! I've used it for several years! And I'm glad its available on Amazon as it isn't sold in the town I live in and I don't like being without it. As the name suggests, they use green whole foods in the formula which I think provides some of the micro nutrients that helps your system make proper use of what's in there. I don't rely on just vitamins to get my nutritional needs met, but with the rush and pressure of daily life, I am glad this product is available to help fill in some of the gaps left by eating on the run, not eating at all, or eating nutrient deficient foods.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I take this product in the place of a multivitamin because multivitamins are putting stuff in them that I do not like or want, such as Lutine and Licopine. It also does not have iron, which I cannot take. I can tell that this product works, in my body. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: great multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I notice that I have more energy with this vitamin. I would highly recommend it. 5 stars. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Take it everyday.. I love that it has the green vegetables in it too that I don't eat everyday.. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kellykane4

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to my friends, glad to be able to have it delivered to my home! Great price
customer_reviews.author: judyrae darling

customer_reviews.title: NOW is always great
customer_reviews.text: Non-synthetic vitamins are the best for you. These guys also have Good Manufacturing Standards
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Label shown is how it looks like when I buy it at my normal store
customer_reviews.text: Read as my normal buy at the herb shop but not.Clear capsule with green powder inside rather then my normal solid green tablet form. Label as shown is not the label I received. Label shown is how it looks like when I buy it at my normal store. This is the label I received.
customer_reviews.author: Don Brigham

customer_reviews.title: Must take 2
customer_reviews.text: I like the other Now EcoGreen Multi better. This is the Veg Cap. You have to take 2 every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Brown

product_meta.title: NOW Foods EcoGreen Multi Vitamin 180 Veg Capsules
product_meta.description: Multiple vitamins help to bridge the nutrient gap in our daily diets. In today's world of processed foods and fast-paced lifestyles, many of us do not get the daily recommended allowance of vitamins, minerals and other nutrients. Multiple vitamins can help fill in the areas lacking in our diets, and are formulated to provide a broad range of nutrition. Natural color variation may occur in this product.
feature_bullets: Multiple vitamins help to bridge the nutrient gap in our daily diets
Iron-free veg capsules formulated to provide a broad range of nutrition
Vegetarian; Non MGO; Nut, Egg, Dairy & Glutten Free
180 Veg Capsules; Servings per container: 90 (2 Veg Capsules)
